translations: v.用……装饰（wainscot 的 ing 形式）

phrs.translation: 壁板料, 护墙板材料

sentences.sentence: To line or panel(a room or wall) with wainscoting.
sentences.translation: 用嵌板面板来装饰墙或天花板。

sentences.sentence: I saw him stick his beastly nose out of the wainscoting.
sentences.translation: 它把鼻子从墙板那边伸出来啦。

sentences.sentence: I wish you could see the wainscoting in that drawing-room, Joe!
sentences.translation: 我希望你能看到客厅里的护壁板，乔！
